channel.title: tag-3 on Slonger's blog
channel.description: Recent content in tag-3 on Slonger's blog

item.title: git webhook 自动部署 hugo 静态网站到 vps
item.description: 环境 ubuntu Ubuntu 16.04.5 LTS; nginx nginx/1.10.3 hugo v0.53 php-fpm7.0 git vps server 配置(www-data 用户) vps server 获取 github repo through ssh 1 2 mkdir /var/www/.ssh chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/.ssh/ 生成ssh key sudo -Hu www-data ssh-keygen -t rsa www-data 用户主 home目录 /var/www 生成s

item.title: Theme preview
item.description: Based on MarkdownPreview test.md. Markdown 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 ### Duplicate Header ### Duplicate Header H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 Duplicate Header Duplicate Header Paragraphs 1 2 3 4 This is a paragraph. I am still part of the paragraph. New paragraph. This is a paragraph. I am still part of the paragraph.
